pageContext.claim: “Since I took office, we have reduced the average claim wait time -- such a big factor in what we're doing; wait times -- by nearly 25 percent. And that number is going to go substantially better with a little more time.”
pageContext.analysis: Since President Trump took office, the average time to complete a Veteran’s disability or pension claim has decreased to 92 days from 133 days, or 31 percent. But wait times for medical care using Veterans Choice remain long, up to 70 days, according to a report from the Government Accountability Office.
